org.nd4j.parameterserver.status.play

Class BaseStatusStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.parameterserver.status.play.BaseStatusStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusStorage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemoryStatusStorage, MapDbStatusStorage

    public abstract class BaseStatusStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatusStorage
    Base status storage for storage logic and scheduling of ejection of instances indicating failure

      • getState

        public SubscriberState getState(int id)
        Get the state given an id. The integer represents a stream id for a given ParameterServerSubscriber.

        A SubscriberState is supposed to be 1 to 1 mapping for a stream and a MediaDriver.

        Specified by:
        getState in interface StatusStorage
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the state to get
        Returns:
        the subscriber state for the given id or none if it doesn't exist
